Posts.Content: Oct 1, 2016 06:01PM Daran wrote: Hi , My oncologist has said he just presumes my 4th round of BC is triple negative. How did you get tested for yours and what was your experience with carboplatinum? Im so not looking forward to another round of chemo, altho I am currently on Xeloda. There has got to be another way to health and recovery!! Thanks Daran
